resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106304</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106304</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204392</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birds of a feather, an interdisciplinary unit: Math/Science wing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birds Of a Feather, eine interdisziplinäre 
Maßeinheit: Math/Science Flügel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Birds Of a Feather, une unité interdisciplinaire 
: Aile de Math/Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Birds Of a Feather, uma unidade interdisciplinary:
Asa de Math/Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Birds Of a Feather, un'unità interdisciplinare: 
Ala di Math/Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πουλιά ενός φτερού, μια διεπιστημονική μονάδα: 
Φτερό Math/epjsti'mis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Birds Of a Feather, una unidad interdisciplinaria:
Ala de Math/Science</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is part of an interdisciplinary unit on birds which contains math/science and language arts components. In the math/science wing, students will prepare frequency tables and construct a circle graph of the species of birds observed at bird feeders.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion ist ein Teil einer 
interdisziplinären Maßeinheit auf Vögeln, die math/science und 
Sprachenkunstbestandteile enthält. Im math/science Flügel 
bereiten Kursteilnehmer Frequenztabellen vor und konstruieren ein 
Kreisdiagramm aus der Sorte der Vögel, die an den Vogelzufuhren 
beobachtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon fait partie d'une unité 
interdisciplinaire sur des oiseaux qui contient math/science et 
composants d'arts de langage. Dans l'aile de math/science, les 
étudiants prépareront des tables de fréquence et construiront un 
graphique de cercle avec des espèces des oiseaux observés aux 
conducteurs d'oiseau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é parte de uma unidade 
interdisciplinary em pássaros que contenha math/science e componentes
das artes da língua. Na asa de math/science, os estudantes 
prepararão tabelas da freqüência e construirão um gráfico do 
círculo da espécie dos pássaros observados em alimentadores do 
pássaro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione fa parte di un'unità 
interdisciplinare sugli uccelli che contiene math/science ed i 
componenti di arti di linguaggio. Nell'ala di math/science, gli 
allievi prepareranno le tabelle di frequenza e costruiranno un grafico
del cerchio con specie di uccelli osservati agli alimentatori 
dell'uccello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα είναι μέρος μιας διεπιστημονικής 
μονάδας στα πουλιά που περιέχει math/tmi'mata τεχνών επιστήμης
και γλώσσας. Στο φτερό math/epjsti'mis, οι σπουδαστές θα 
προετοιμάσουν τους πίνακες συχνότητας και θα κατασκευάσουν μια 
γραφική παράσταση κύκλων των ειδών πουλιών που παρατηρούνται 
στους τροφοδότες πουλιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección es parte de una unidad 
interdisciplinaria en pájaros que contenga math/science y componentes
de los artes del lenguaje. En el ala de math/science, los 
estudiantes prepararán los vectores de la frecuencia y construirán 
un gráfico del círculo de la especie de los pájaros observados en 
los alimentadores del pájaro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:VICKY SMATHERS
FN:VICKY SMATHERS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106304</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/birds-of-a-feather-an-interdisciplinary-unit-math-science-wing</uri>
